N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2404.3 - Application for reinstatement

State Regulations

An institution, against which a final adverse decision has
been issued under this Part, may at any time request reinstatement of its full
eligibility and may submit to the president such material as it wishes, or as
the president requests, to demonstrate that the basis for such decision has
been remedied and is unlikely to recur. The president shall respond to such
request within 30 days and, if he denies the request, shall provide reasons for
such denial. An institution whose request has been denied shall be given an
opportunity to show cause why such request should not be denied. However, the
president need not consider a request to remove a limitation, or grant an
opportunity to show cause, if such request is submitted within six months of a
previous denial. Notes
